sourcesContent:
import "./current-weather.css"; const WEEK_DAY = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'] const MONTH = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'Aug','Sept','Oct','Nov','Dec'] const CurrentWeather = ({ data }) => { const currentDay = new Date() const day = currentDay.getDay() - 1 const dayNum = currentDay.getDate() const month = currentDay.getMonth() return (
{data.city}
{WEEK_DAY[day]}, {MONTH[month]} {dayNum}

{data.weather[0].description}

{Math.round(data.main.temp)}°C

Feels like {Math.round(data.main.feels_like)}°C

Wind {Math.round(data.wind.speed)}m/s
Humidity {Math.round(data.main.humidity)}%
Pressure {data.main.pressure} hPa
); } export default CurrentWeather;
